* On Windows: `"%APPDATA%"\Komodo\VRSCTEST`

What should I do if I have launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to the latest release?

If you have launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to the latest release, you should delete the following directories before running the new update:
* On Linux: `~/.komodo/vrsctest`
* On MacOS: `⁨Users⁩/⁨{YourUserName}/⁨Library⁩/⁨Application Support⁩/⁨Komodo/vrsctest`
* On Windows: `"%APPDATA%"\Komodo\VRSCTEST`
